attributes.action: Government needs to reconsider police cutbacks
attributes.additional_details: The riots of 6,7,8 and 9 August 2011 have proved that the proposed cuts to our police forces cannot go ahead.  The emergency services were stretched to breaking point and fewer numbers would have resulted in even more injuries, destruction and death.  We want an open parliamentary debate on the proposed cuts, and an independent study on the effects such cuts would have on the ability of the police force to deal with such events in future.
